text: @Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse Close to 50% of the Covid-19 deaths in the US are from nursing homes, which is a rate of well over 100 times the rest of the population. Article in AT with very doable solutions that can help save tens of thousands of lives in nursing homes. @marklevinshow https://t.co/DysOa9JCtG
